title: Not Being Able to Right Click Champions + Minions
body:
Experienced 2 Games now where even trying to reset my league settings to default would not fix and issue with being inable to attack champions or minions.
Happened in a Summoners Rift Game playing Rakan
Two Days later happened again during a ARAM playing Cassiopea where I couldn't even target minions with my abilities (E) 

Did not restart client but went into Practice match following where the game functioned as normal so I doubt it is to do with my mouse (Roccat Nyth)

Has Anyone else experienced this issue

replies.body:
Could be an overlay issue or something similar hijacking focus focus from the game.

My first recommendations would be to turn off anything like discord, overwolf, nvidia etc overlays and to make sure your GPU drivers are up to date.

I'd also recommend running a client repair just to be safe.

If you still experience the issue, player support is your next best step: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
